Date maintenance tags and general fixes
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
rvv to last version by SmartBagel
rvv to last version by Samsmasam
/* Death */ This needs a citation unless it is all part of citation #30. If it is, then excuse this revision.
/* Awards */ "Madame Marie Curie" is inconsistent with the rest of the article. The preceding article mentions her as "Marie" or uses "Skłodowska-Curie".
/* Death */ Even though Pierre's date of death was already mentioned, it is confusing to say "Curie". ie: If someone were to click on the link to "Death" without reading the preceding article.
/* Post-war years */ "triumphally" is not a real word according to Oxford, dictionary.com, and thefreedictionary.com
